Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Psamtek called Iahmes, born of Bastetirdis, with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands holding a relief adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with eight rows of Hieroglyphs; back-pillar and a plinth.
Curator's comments: The collection contains four other shabtis of the same man (EA 8974, 8976, 8977 and 57627).
